zsa.ampstats~.digest: Report min/mean/max/sum of a signal vector or a FFT frame.

zsa.bark~.digest: Calculates and outputs Bark coefficients as a list.

zsa.centroid~.digest: Spectral centroid is the barycentre of the spectrum.

zsa.dct.digest: Calculates and outputs Discrete Cosine Transform

zsa.decrease.digest: Decrease reports the amount of spectral magnitude decreasing.

zsa.decrease~.digest: Decrease reports the amount of spectral magnitude decreasing.

zsa.energy~.digest: Calculates the energy of each Frequency Bin (r * r + i * i).

zsa.flatness~.digest: Spectral flatness of key frequency bands.

zsa.flux~.digest: Calculates spectral flux (difference of energy between frames).

zsa.freqpeak~.digest: Extract a list of pairs Frequency / Amplitude peaks by FFT frame.

zsa.fund.digest: Estimate fundamental frequency of a list of Frequency / Amplitude Pairs.

zsa.kurtosis~.digest: zsa.kurtosis~ returns a measure of the flatness of a spectrum around its barycenter.

zsa.mel~.digest: Calculates and outputs Mel Coefficients as a list.

zsa.mfcc~.digest: Outputs Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients as a list.

zsa.rolloff~.digest: zsa.rolloff~ returns the spectral rollof point.

zsa.skewness~.digest: zsa.skewness~ returns a measure of the asymmetry of a spectrum around its barycenter.

zsa.slope.digest: zsa.slope returns an estimation of the amount of spectral magnitude decreasing, computed by a linear regression on a numeric spectral magnitude list.

zsa.slope~.digest: zsa.slope~ returns an estimation of the amount of spectral magnitude decreasing.

zsa.spread~.digest: zsa.spread~ returns the spectral spread, i.e., the variance around the spectral barycenter

zsa.virtfund.digest: Tries to calculate the virtual fundamental.
